title: PRICES REDUCED: more T206's W/ HOF
author: tolstoi

posts.post_title: PRICES REDUCED: more T206's W/ HOF
posts.post_content:
I am selling these to make room for other projects I am pursuing.  These are all very nice and should be nice additions to any collection.  Paypal gift preferred and free shipping.  Hope these find a good home.

Jesse Tannehill g+ $26 Sold :)

Ryan, I'll take Fielder Jones and Bill Burns.

Edit: they came in today, and they look great. Thank you again, Ryan! Always a pleasure!
